author: Andrew Kerr
title: Stacey Abrams dark money group hauled in $62 million following 2018 election loss

sentence: Former President Donald Trump's "Save America" political action committee (PAC) on Tuesday sent an email to subscribers that linked to an article that claims Governor Brian Kemp's victory in last week's Republican gubernatorial primary was the result of voter fraud.
author: Jon Jackson
title: Trump Pushes Claim That Brian Kemp's 50-Point Victory Was Fraud

sentence: Former President Donald Trump's political action committee (PAC) suggested, groundlessly, that Georgia Governor Brian Kemp won his primary via fraud, returning to a familiar theme.
author: Tom Porter
title: Trump's PAC baselessly claims Brian Kemp's 52-point victory in Georgia governor primary was because of fraud
